title: Patient Endurance Brings Forth God's Promise | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Patient Endurance Brings Forth God's Promise | Victoria Osteen
description:
It’s through patient endurance that God prepares us for His promises. When we learn to wait well, we’ll develop the strength we need to receive His blessings.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
